attributes.action: Southern rail to compensate passengers & TFL to take over with immediate effect.
attributes.additional_details: If anyone has evidence please retain for investigation.
attributes.background: Months of severe ongoing delays and cancelled trains are causing high levels of stress and associated costs to passengers. The level of disruption to family and working life is totally unacceptable. Someone needs to do something about it NOW.

rejection.details:
The Government has announced a new partnership with TfL:

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/transport-secretary-and-mayor-set-out-vision-for-rail-travel-across-london-and-the-south-east

If you would like the Government to take a different action, you could start a new petition asking specifically for the change you would like to happen.

We also have a petition already open calling for refunds to be paid to delayed rail passengers:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/132726
